lead_paragraph: The prolific Virat Kohli, Joe Root, Steve Smith and Kane Williamson all enhanced their burgeoning reputations in 2016 but, aided by the screams of commentator Ian Bishop to "remember the name", the year will forever belong to Carlos Brathwaite.

headline.print_headline: Brathwaite T20 Heroics Light Up Year of Master Batsmen
headline.main: Brathwaite T20 Heroics Light Up Year of Master Batsmen

snippet: The prolific Virat Kohli, Joe Root, Steve Smith and Kane Williamson all enhanced their burgeoning reputations in 2016 but, aided by the screams of commentator Ian Bishop to "remember the name", the year will forever belong to Carlos Brathwaite....
